name: Daedalus (nicknesbitt)
description:
Fly the space shuttle Daedalus into space avoiding birds, planes, and asteroids, racking up points the higher and longer you go.  Just watch that heat, or you may burn up.

Arrows or WASD to move (Hold the button to start moving in that direction), Space to BOOST, Enter to Teleport (can only activate right before being hit), Numbers to control radio.

Tips: A narrow miss will increase your score multiplier. Teleport can only be used under certain circumstances. 

Known Issues: There is an issue with the built in game restart at the end of the game causing the audio to no longer play.
